ygData.subject: Re: My experience getting Tinkering to 75 ...
ygData.msgSnippet: That s wacky, I ve heard about silk armor and someone made some bone a while back.  I met someone who s friend made them some snakeskin but obviously they
ygData.messageBody:
That's wacky, I've heard about silk armor and someone made some bone a
while back. I met someone who's friend made them some snakeskin but
obviously they weren't willing to part with the secret. One of my
characters just found the cash cow and milked it dry so I think it's
time to start tailoring.. not being a gnome he can't put the coin to
REAL use. Ah well..
I've not found any sites with info except 'hey, lookie what I did!'.
If anyone wants me to report my findings (if there are any...) I will,
just give me your E, I'd like to post it here but off topic is a nasty
nasty thing on an elist.
So.. pardon for the offtopic.



---Bruce Brownlee <brucebrownlee@...> wrote:
>
> From: "Bruce Brownlee" <brucebrownlee@...>
>
> Very off subject, but does anyone know of a good site that tells all
about
> tailoring?
> I already know how to make the general leather, studded, and
reinforced
> armor. And also the formula to make the backpacks.
> But what about the quivers? What about the latest news of tailoring
as to
> the latest patch.
> There must be a good site out there for this, yet it has evaded me.
> If you do know of a good site please tell me.
> I apologize for posting this here, but I didn't really know where
else to
> ask for help.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Clanof1@...>
> To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 3:40 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] My experience getting Tinkering to 75 ...
>
>
> > From: Clanof1@...
> >
> > um, you cant make the spyglass anyways, how would yo know if its
trivial?
> > dont you need that fishing pole. if not id like the magic formula
